StatProperty.Name: Current Life
StatProperty.Description: If this value reaches zero, the associated character dies.

StatProperty.Name: Maximum Life
StatProperty.Description: Current Life cannot normally exceed this value.

StatProperty.Name: Current Armor
StatProperty.Description: Divide damage taken by this value.

StatProperty.Name: Maximum Armor
StatProperty.Description: Current Armor cannot normally exceed this value.

StatProperty.Name: Armor Decay Amount
StatProperty.Description: Per frequency, Current Armor goes down by this amount.

StatProperty.Name: Armor Decay Rate
StatProperty.Description: Frequency in seconds of Armor Decay.

StatProperty.Name: Armor Absorption
StatProperty.Description: Gain Armor equal to this value when you are hit by an attack.

StatProperty.Name: Free Armor
StatProperty.Description: Reduce damage taken by this amount.

StatProperty.Name: Move Speed
StatProperty.Description: Character move speed in units per second.

StatProperty.Name: Jump Speed
StatProperty.Description: Speed at the start of a jump in units per second.

StatProperty.Name: Midair Reverse Speed
StatProperty.Description: Horizontal speed in midair if the character reverses direction in midair.
